unit_rules.name: Daemonkin
unit_rules.text: While this model is leading a unit, the unit has +1 to Advance and Charge rolls.

unit_rules.name: Sacrificial Dagger
unit_rules.text: Once per Battle Round, when this model is selected to shoot or fight, it may suffer 1 mortal damage. If it does, until the end of the Battle Round, it gains +1 to the Hit roll and +1 to the Wound roll.
